===============
python-TSIP API
===============

While the low-level and high-level API are implemented in
separate modules both are also directly accessible by importing
the top-level `tsip` module.

High-level API
-------------

.. automodule:: tsip.hlapi
      :members:
      :inherited-members:

Low-level API
-------------

.. automodule:: tsip.llapi
      :members:
      :inherited-members:
